resources.string: Arunachalam is a sacred hill revered as a form of Lord Shiva. It stands as a symbol of divine fire, knowledge, and liberation. Devotees believe circumambulating the hill brings spiritual grace. The place radiates silence, peace, and inner awakening. Arunachalam is not just a mountain, but a path to self-realization ğŸ™
